about_the_game:
Enter an unusual 1960s office, trapped in a loop. In this 1-6 player co-op or single-player adventure, you'll explore rooms 0 to 9, where anomalies may appear in some rooms but not all. Objects shift, disappear, or appear where they don’t belong, and it’s up to you to find them. Solve puzzles, avoid deadly traps, and find all anomalies to progress. The eerie atmosphere keeps you on edge, with each room bringing you closer to the exit—or sending you back to Room 0.

Rules

>Start at Room 0

>No Anomalies in Room 0

>In each Room, something may be different from Room 0

>Mark the differences as anomalies

>If you mark the anomalies correctly you will move to the next level

>If you're wrong you will go back to Room 0

>Exit at Room 9

Good luck!

Online Multiplayer

>Explore an online multiplayer experience for 1-6 players, working together to find anomalies

>Players can join or host lobbies, either private or public

>Communicate and help each other through text chat or in-game

Single Player

>Explore the single-player experience, identical to the multiplayer mode

Equipments

Mark tool

>A simple tool to mark anomalies. Use it to mark, undo, or clear all marks.

Gameplay Features

>Play together with 1-6 players

>Immerse yourself in atmospheric places

>Find and mark anomalies

>Solve puzzles to proceed

>Be careful of deadly traps

In this game, there are 9 rooms. Each one is like Room 0 (the starting room), but with some changes, like objects being replaced, changed, or new ones appearing. These changes are called anomalies.

Observation Room

75 unique anomalies

Short Story:

The Observation Room was originally created to study the endless expanse of Black Water, a mysterious, pitch-black sea full of anomalies and strange occurrences. At first, it was a place for careful observation, but soon, these anomalies began to appear inside the room itself. What started as small changes gradually escalated, with objects in the room shifting, dangerous new items appearing, and deadly traps materializing where they didn’t belong. Now, a team is assigned every morning to find and mark all anomalies from Room 0 to 9, and then exit, identifying their frequency to return them to their original state or eliminate non-existent objects — today, it’s your team's turn.

Find and mark all anomalies!

Set in an unusual 1960s office, the environment is built using Unreal Engine 5 to create a uniquely chilling experience. Cinematic lighting, details, and thoughtful design create a tense and unsettling atmosphere. With horror and gore elements, Exit Together hides many surprises that keep players on edge. The mix of retro style and modern graphics adds to the thriller.

>All achievements can also be completed in single-player

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a realistic atmosphere. Player characters can die through various means, some involving dismemberment or decapitation. The game features frequent violence, blood, gore, body parts, and horror themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Unreal Engine 5 Requires Latest update of GPU Driver & Windows 10/11

short_description: Exit Together is a 1-6 player co-op or single-player anomaly loop adventure game. Find anomalies, solve puzzles, and avoid traps. Set in a retro 1960s office atmosphere, observe your surroundings carefully to reach the next room. Will you reach Room 9 and exit, or remain trapped forever in the loop?
